docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: add_numbers Function
docs.text:
Here is the automatically generated documentation for the add_numbers function:

Add two numbers together.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default a int

The first number.

required b int

The second number.

required

Returns:

Name Type Description int int

The sum of the two numbers.

Source code in simulacra/foo.py 
def add_numbers(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    """
    Add two numbers together.

    Parameters:
        a (int): The first number.
        b (int): The second number.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of the two numbers.
    """
    return a + b
